column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Get Popular on the Internet
#Text=You 've been on the net for years .
#Text=Yet , almost nobody knows about your web presence .
#Text=You just want to be well known and you want people to talk about your online prowess and exploits .
#Text=To become popular on the internet is possible , it 'll just require a bit more effort beyond what you 're doing normally .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Creating an Online Presence
#Text=Understand why do you want to get popular .
#Text=Be absolutely certain that you want to be a popular online presence .
#Text=With popularity comes loss of peace , the inability to move around quietly and a need to maintain a great reputation in your chosen field of popularity .
#Text=This can add up to a lot of effort , especially if you 're not being paid for it and have to keep that day job up .
#Text=It can also erode your humility and cause you to behave in ways that are n't entirely you and can lead to dissatisfaction .
#Text=If you 're okay with this , proceed with the next steps .
#Text=Join plenty of social networking sites .
#Text=Start with the well known ones , such as Twitter , Facebook and the like .

#Text=Then tailor your online presence to the area for which you 're keen to be known , such as graphic design , scene fashion , smoothies-maker extraordinaire , medical explanations guru , or whatever it is .

#Text=Find a blog , website , portal , forum , etc. , where you can make the most of your talents and start creating your presence there through adding information , interacting and being around a lot .
#Text=Join bigger social sites .
#Text=Go onto Friendster , start stalking some people – be sure to add a lot of friends for yourself .
#Text=Pick the sites Google likes .
#Text=That way , your name has a better chance of coming back in the top first page returns when people search online for you and your talents .
#Text=Google is always reworking its algorithms , so check Alexa and similar to find out which social networking sites are currently hip and happening .
#Text=Link to high page rank sites that are related to your site is the key .
#Text=Submit to directories such as Add Your Site Free Submit
#Text=Post your creations , knowledge , information , comments , etc. , on different sites .
#Text=Work the imagination and make a site work for you .
#Text=As for people who want to be popular for their style or looks , obviously , start posting your pictures all over the web .
#Text=Get someone able to take quality pictures of you .
#Text=Being the Kind of Person Others Love to Connect With
#Text=Be unique .
#Text=If you 're copying everyone else , there is a good chance that you 're not going to be seen or heard about .
#Text=Few people are keen to see the same , same .
#Text=Thus , think of a new trend , or try something that nobody has done before , even if it 's a common topic done very differently .
#Text=Be nice .
#Text=And be genuinely nice , not just putting on an act .
#Text=If you want to be known as grumpy and gruff , do n't chop and change by pretending to be nice one minute , then horrible the next .
#Text=Get your brand straight .
#Text=Join sites that have forums .
#Text=Then be available and interactive , so that people can get to know you and trust in you .
#Text=Be aware that this is likely to chew up your time considerably .
#Text=Be careful what discussions you get involved in ; keep it light , friendly and caring .
#Text=Add friends .
#Text=When you 're on social websites , add many friends .
#Text=Have a big list of them !
#Text=Because the friends of your friends will start adding you , and you 'll get more and more well known .
#Text=Provide valuable updates , insights and information .
#Text=People are thirsty for good content , not self-love .
#Text=Give them something they 're keen to watch , read or listen to .
#Text=Introduce them to interesting things on a regular basis .
#Text=Bring together the energies of other people whose work and updates add value to yours , so that you spread around support for others online .
#Text=Tips
#Text=For
#Text=to be-popular internet celebs , get someone to take pictures of you .
#Text=And sometimes , you will have to photo shop your pics ( read the tip above ) .
#Text=For to be-popular graphic designers , get a good editing program like Adobe Photoshop .
#Text=Do you know how the graphic designer Nineland got popular ?
#Text=She worked as a graphic designer for a site called Miss Bimbo .
#Text=Plan on stuff !
#Text=For example " Today , I 'm joining Myspace and I 'm going to add 10 friends " .
#Text=Warnings
#Text=Do n't give up .
#Text=You will never become popular on the internet just in a week .
#Text=For some , it takes six months , for others it takes longer .
#Text=Do n't let popularity spoil you .
#Text=If you 're popular , it does n't mean that you 're any better than your ( internet ) friends .
#Text=Respect everyone .
#Text=Do n't get into fights .
#Text=This might make people dislike you .
#Text=And your popularity might move down/ become lower .
#Text=Popularity dies easily .
#Text=It 's okay to be away from the internet for a week , two weeks .
#Text=But when you reach five months , do n't be surprised if someone has taken your place .
#Text=This is how it is , people love novelty and fresh faces .
#Text=Becoming popular is easy but keeping it is hard at the same time .
#Text=Things
#Text=You 'll Need
#Text=A good editing program
#Text=Someone to take pics of you
#Text=( optional )
#Text=Good social sites to join
#Text=Tutorials to help you in graphic designing
#Text=( optional )
#Text=Someone that you will try to be like { optional )
